description_start: This tool allows the customized visualization of the groundwater model results for the Alto Grande, Médio Grande, Corrente and Carinhanha river basins. More information about the flow model developed using the model

modal_info_title: Groundwater Model Data Viewer - Aditional information
modal_info_paraghaph01: In order to provide an adequate understanding of the functioning mechanisms of the Urucuia Aquifer System (UAS) regarding recharge, water circulation and responses to stress imposed by pumping, land use and land cover change, drought periods and others, the project “Improvement of the Flow Model of the Urucuia Aquifer System and Evaluation of Future Explotation Scenarios”, which involves the improvement in the calibration of mathematical model of groundwater flow of the UAS in Bahia territory.
modal_info_paraghaph02: The UAS comprises a total area of about 125,000 km², extending from the south of the states of Maranhão and Piauí, to the extreme northwest of Minas Gerais, the main area of occurrence being the west of the state of Bahia, forming the Chapada do São Francisco (Figure 1).
modal_info_paraghaph03: The numerical three-dimensional flow model of the present study was developed with the Visual Modflow software. The approach used in the development of the model involved the division of the UAS in the state of Bahia into four sub-areas of work, obeying the river basins of the Alto Rio Grande, the Middle Rio Grande, the Corrente River and the Carinhanha River (the latter only the basin located in the state of Bahia) (Figure 2).
modal_info_paraghaph04: This tool provides interactive visualization of elevation, total aquifer thickness and head data for the Alto and Médio Rio Grande, Corrente and Carinhanha basins, as well as their energy balance data. More information on the parameterized hydrogeological models for each study area can be accessed at:
modal_info_paraghaph05: Mathematical models can be downloaded at:
modal_info_paraghaph06: Detailed zones can be accessed on the OBahia mapserver:
modal_info_figure_legend_01: UAS area corresponding to the western region of Bahia.
modal_info_figure_legend_02: Regions adopted for the realization of the simulations of UAS, according to the hydrographic basins of the study region: Alto Grande, Médio Grande, Corrente and Carinhanha rivers.
